AuQFyFJvXeeV68Zq.name: Benefit
AuQFyFJvXeeV68Zq.description: Effect: Choose one of the following benefits:

system.story: I seen the goblin king run ’im through with a spear. Then I seen ’im pull ’imself back up, spear still in ’im, and headbutt the goblin king … then he pulls out the spear and throws it on the goblin king’s corpse.

prerequisites.value: You defeat a foe while at or below 0 Stamina.
